#summary Guide to installing TextBE
#sidebar TableOfContents

= Installing TextBE =

  # Download and install [http://www.graphviz.org/Download..php Graphviz] (if not already installed).
  # Download and install [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/release/galileo/sr2 Eclipse Gallileo SR2] Modeling Tools (includes incubating projects)
  # Install Eclipse Graphviz using the Abstratt Update Site
    * Help => Install new software ... => Add
       * Name: Abstratt Update Site
       * Location: http://abstratt.com/update
    * Deselect Group Items by Category option
    * Select Eclipse Graphviz
    * Choose okay to security warning when prompted
    * Restart Eclipse when prompted
  # Install EMFText using the Reuseware Update Site
    * Help => Install new software ... => Add
      * Name: Reuseware Update Site
      * Location: http://reuseware.org/update
    * Select EMFText Access
    * Choose okay to security warning when prompted
    * Restart Eclipse when prompted
  # Install TextBE using the BE Update Site
    * Help => Install new software .. => Add
       * Name: Behavior Engineering Update Site
       * Location: http://www.behaviorengineering.org/update
    * Select BE => TextBE Feature
    * Choose okay to security warning when prompted
    * Restart Eclipse when prompted
  # Add xercesImpl.jar (The jar file can be extracted from this zip file [http://www.java2s.com/Code/JarDownload/xercesImpl.jar.zip xercesImpl.jar.zip]) to your java /lib/ext folder
